movie.title: Ice Age
movie.description_intro: Back when the Earth was being overrun by glaciers, and animals were scurrying to save themselves from the upcoming Ice Age, a sloth named Sid, a woolly mammoth named Manny, and a saber-toothed tiger named Diego are forced to become unlikely heroes. The three reluctantly come together when they have to return a human child to its father while braving the deadly elements of the impending Ice Age.
movie.description_full: Back when the Earth was being overrun by glaciers, and animals were scurrying to save themselves from the upcoming Ice Age, a sloth named Sid, a woolly mammoth named Manny, and a saber-toothed tiger named Diego are forced to become unlikely heroes. The three reluctantly come together when they have to return a human child to its father while braving the deadly elements of the impending Ice Age.

movies.title: The Taking
movies.summary: Two strangers must discover a way to escape a sinister family who wishes to sacrifice their souls to an evil presence.
movies.description_full: Two strangers must discover a way to escape a sinister family who wishes to sacrifice their souls to an evil presence.
movies.synopsis: Two strangers must discover a way to escape a sinister family who wishes to sacrifice their souls to an evil presence.

movies.title: The Mystery of D.B. Cooper
movies.summary: A documentary that looks at the well-known case, which is largely regarded as the greatest unsolved heist in American history.
movies.description_full: A documentary that looks at the well-known case, which is largely regarded as the greatest unsolved heist in American history.
movies.synopsis: A documentary that looks at the well-known case, which is largely regarded as the greatest unsolved heist in American history.

movies.title: Red Sorghum
movies.summary: In 1930s China a young woman is sent by her father to marry the leprous owner of a winery. In the nearby red sorghum fields she falls for one of his servants. When the master dies she finds herself inheriting the isolated business.
movies.description_full: In 1930s China a young woman is sent by her father to marry the leprous owner of a winery. In the nearby red sorghum fields she falls for one of his servants. When the master dies she finds herself inheriting the isolated business.
movies.synopsis: In 1930s China a young woman is sent by her father to marry the leprous owner of a winery. In the nearby red sorghum fields she falls for one of his servants. When the master dies she finds herself inheriting the isolated business.

movies.title: War Room
movies.summary: Filled with heart, humor, and wit, WAR ROOM follows Tony and Elizabeth Jordan, a couple who seemingly have it all-great jobs, a beautiful daughter, their dream home. But appearances can be deceiving. In reality, their marriage has become a war zone and their daughter is collateral damage. With guidance from Miss Clara, an older, wiser woman, Elizabeth discovers she can start fighting for her family instead of against them. As the power of prayer and Elizabeth's newly energized faith transform her life, will Tony join the fight and become the man he knows he needs to be? Together, their real enemy doesn't have a prayer.
